subject: RE: [junit] Re: JavaDocs
msgSnippet: Never mind, dumb question. I was reading automatic javadoc generation and that s not what you were talking about at all. Duh. :-) Richard ...
messageBody:
Never mind, dumb question. I was reading "automatic javadoc generation"
and that's not what you were talking about at all. Duh. :-)
Richard

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Richard Brooks
> Sent: Thursday, February 21, 2002 2:46 PM
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: RE: [junit] Re: JavaDocs
>
> Mike,
>
>
> >I typically use
> > JavaDoc
> > simply to look up a method signature, which can easily be kept in
> synch
> > with the code using an automated build process.
> >
>
> Interesting idea. Would you happen to have a working example of
> something that could slide into Ant that does this?
>
> TIA,
> Richard
